coded_answer.p: I would like to knowhave some informationsinformation about the advertisement offor the show.

First of all, why did the show beganbegin at 20:15, not at 19:30 as indicated in the advertisement. I waited quitealmost one hour to see the show, and what happened with the actor? I came to that show only for seeto see him and when the actor appearappeared, it was another one. There is more! Where were the discounts that I should have earnedhad? I was very disappointed with that! After the show my sunson wanted to eat some biscuits and when I seesaw the restaurant closed, I gave up,. I told to my sunson that we'll never come back here again.

The restaurant was closed because there wasn't any electricity you. You should close the theatre untilluntil the restaurant getcan appropriatebe to useused. I was totalytotally unsatisfied with the theatre and I would like to have my money back if it'sthat's possible.
I thank you for readreading my letter,. I hope you write forto me backback to me, and don't forget my money!
I am writing what I think whatthe kind of clothes will peoplepeople will wear 100 years from now will be like.

As we see, the clothesfashions are changing every hour. People are inventing new kinds of clothes and people are buying and wearing differentsdifferent clothes. It is difficult to say how people will be wearing clothes 100 years from now.

In each country, each people wearwears differentsdifferent kinds of clothes, likefor example, people in Brazil wear shorts, T-shirts or onlygo without them,; in Saudi Arabian they wear strange clothes, if you analyse them from the point of view of someone who doesn't live in Saudi Arabia. I'm quite sure that people in all around the world will be wearing very differentsdifferent clothes in the future because people, especialyespecially women, who like to be very elegant and beautiful, will create and invent all kinds of clothes to anybody and that's it.
